pr_title: Acceptance Test refactors for command tests

timeline.message:
Acceptance Test refactors

Refactors prior to Backup/Restore
* Allow multiple extra commands on the command line
* Extra commands appear at the end of the command line
* Pull node setup out of DB migration test

Signed-off-by: Danno Ferrin <danno.ferrin@gmail.com>

timeline.author: RatanRSur

replies.bodyText:
They are interchangeable - https://stackoverflow.com/a/46619739/8020
I prefer List.of() to train myself to use List.of(...) for fixed content lists.
